greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows, X^n * [1,0,0,0,...]; where X = a tridiagonal matrix with (1,1,1,...) in the main and subdiagonals and (1,2,3,...) in the subsubdiagonal.
comment: Rightmost terms of each row form A001147: (1, 1, 3, 15, 105, 945,...).
example: First few rows of the triangle are:
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_ & _Roger L. Bagula_, May 25 2008
